name: Knightfall
description: Darkness consumes your surroundings and you will have to adventure through the labyrinth ahead of you to escape in this retro pixel-art action RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2) or later Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad Supported
